description: This file defines an interface `IRtspClient` in the `WPEFramework::Exchange` namespace for an RTSP client component, containing virtual methods for configuration, setup, playback control, and parameter management.

classes.name: IRtspClient
classes.description: An interface for RTSP client operations, including configuration, control (setup, play, teardown), and parameter management.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Configures the RTSP client with the given service shell.

methods.name: Setup
methods.description: Sets up the RTSP client with the specified asset ID and position.

methods.name: Play
methods.description: Controls the playback scale and position.

methods.name: Set
methods.description: Sets a parameter by name and value.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a parameter by name.

ctags.name: IRtspClient
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IRtspClient : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
